document_data.name: Lancilon Seenabuck
document_data.languages:
[[Common]]
[[Payit language|Payit]] (knew enough to make himself clear)
document_data.Personality: Lancilon was totally confused by Maztican customs. He desperately to wanted go home.
document_data.Possessions:
While in Maztica, Lancilon dressed in [[breeches]], a [[cap]], a good [[cloth]] [[cloak]], a [[tunic]], and a [[vest]]. They also wore a [[backpack]] in which they carried [[thieves' tools]], [[paper]], and [[ink]].

In terms of weaponry, Lancilon possessed a [[short sword]], a [[shortbow]] with twenty [[arrow]]s, and a [[starwheel pistol]] with enough [[smokepowder]] for six shots.
document_data.History: Lancilon was a thief until he tried to steal [[arquebuse]]s from the temple of [[Gond]] in [[Lantan]] but was discovered. In order to escape, he hid aboard a ship, not knowing it was sailing to [[Helmsport]]. Lancilon found himself in a strange new world where he knew nothing. He needed gold to go back home. Having heard about [[Nexal]], he thought it was a good place where he could find gold.
